title: 35 set server url in command line params or choose from server urls section in openapi specification
fix(deps): upgrade ratatui and all other dependencies to the latest
fix(phone): fixed empty-optional query string issue
Added support for query/header commands
body:
- [x]  add query command
- [x]  add header command
- [x] fix empty commands in command history
- [x] add request open command
- [x] add response save command

title: nix: add default package
body:
solves nix run error:
$ nix run github:zaghaghi/openapi-tui
error: flake 'github:zaghaghi/openapi-tui' does not provide attribute 'apps.x86_64-linux.default', 'defaultApp.x86_64-linux', 'packages.x86_64-linux.default' or 'defaultPackage.x86_64-linux'

title: feat: :sparkles: added history popup to show list of previous requests
feat: :sparkles: added basic commands, and timed status lines
feat: added customizable status line in footer
Support Multi Page
body: having multi page tui becomes easier with this refactor

title: Feat: add keybindings for navigation to adjacent tabs
body:
Thank you to useful TUI!
I added keybindings for navigating to the next/previous tab using `]` and `[`.
Of course, I understand that tab navigation can also be done using numeric keys, so there might be some overlap in features. If you think this is a duplicate feature, please feel free to close this pull request!

title: 12 add support for searching in the apis pane
Adds support for NixOS
body:
Description:
This pull request adds support for NixOS via Flake or NixOS `configuration.nix`. Updated README.md with instructions for installation and configuration.

Any feedback to improve the integration is appreciated.
(tested and used in my configuration)

title: feat: added fullscreen support for panes
docs: mention the Arch Linux package
body:
Hey! :bear:

I packaged this awesome project for Arch Linux: https://archlinux.org/packages/extra/x86_64/openapi-tui/

This PR simply updates README.md to mention this package and also adds the repology badge for the other distro packages.

Cheers!

title: feat: show path in api list
